result.execSummary:
The defendant Eric Kenneth Post was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Eric Kenneth Post is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Eric Kenneth Post was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must report to Probation by the end of the day on November 7, 2014.
Concurrent with: 14CF260

miscConds.notes: Compas and follow through with recommendations.

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

CASES: 13CF312, 14CF194 & 14CF260. Defendant Eric Kenneth Post in court with attorney Daniel James Chapman.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 3:38 pm.  
14CF260-Counts 1 & 2 dismissed.  Count 3-repeater stricken.  Count 3-Def-NC plea.  
14CF194-Count 1 AMENDED to misd bail jumping, no repeater 946.49(1)a.  Count 2 dismissed.  Count 1-NC plea.  CT-accept pleas, adj guilty/judgment entered.

SENTENCE:  on both - W/H SENTENCE, probation 6 mo.  COMPAS & follow through.  No fine/costs.  Report to probation by end of 11/7.  3:50 pm adj.
Plea hearing on November 6, 2014 at 02:00 pm.
Scheduling conference on October 6, 2014 at 09:00 am.
